member.summary: Provides methods used in OAuth authentication.

member.name: M:GogoKit.Clients.IOAuth2Client.GetAuthorizationUrl(System.Uri,System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{System.String})
member.summary: Gets the URL where applications can obtain a user’s consent to make API calls on their behalf.
member.param: Application return URL where the authorization code is sent. This must match the URL registered for your application
The scopes that specify the type of access that is needed.
member.remarks: If the user accepts the request, viagogo will redirect them back to your application's with a temporary code that can be exchanged for an access token.

member.name: M:GogoKit.Clients.IOAuth2Client.GetAuthorizationUrl(System.Uri,System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{System.String},System.String)
member.summary: Gets the URL where applications can obtain a user’s consent to make API calls on their behalf.
member.param: Application redirect URL where the authorization code is sent. This must match the URL registered for your application
The scopes that specify the type of access that is needed.
An opaque value used to maintain state between the authorize request and the callback.
member.remarks: If the user accepts the request, viagogo will redirect them back to your application's with a temporary code that can be exchanged for an access token.

The authorization code that was sent to your application’s return URL.
The scopes that specify the type of access that is needed.
